mapper.sql: select member_id, name, sex, birthday, tel_number, regist_time, address from member
mapper.select: where member_id like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or tel_number like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or regist_time like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or address like concat('%', #{info}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into member (name, sex, birthday, tel_number, regist_time, address) values (#{name}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{telNumber}, #{registTime}, #{address})
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel_number = #{telNumber}, regist_time = #{registTime}, address = #{address} where member_id = #{memberId}
